title: 100Vigha – Real Estate Website
subtitle: A modern real estate platform built using React and Firebase.
description: A comprehensive real estate platform designed to connect property buyers with sellers through an intuitive and modern interface. The platform features advanced search capabilities, property management tools, and seamless user experience across all devices.
purpose: The primary goal was to create a user-friendly real estate platform that simplifies property search and listing management. The target audience includes property buyers, sellers, and real estate agents looking for a modern digital solution.
features: Property listing with advanced filters (price, location, type)
Contact form for property inquiries with email notifications
Responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop
Admin dashboard for managing property listings
Search functionality with autocomplete suggestions

techStack.name: React.js
techStack.description: Chosen for its component-based architecture and reusability, allowing for efficient development and maintenance.

techStack.name: Node.js
techStack.description: Used for building scalable backend services and APIs, enabling efficient server-side operations.

techStack.name: MongoDB
techStack.description: Provided a flexible NoSQL database solution for storing and managing property data.

techStack.name: AWS
techStack.description: Utilized for cloud hosting, storage, and deployment to ensure reliability and scalability.

title: OZANK – Global Money Transfer App
subtitle: A secure and intuitive global money transfer app built with React and Firebase.
description: A robust platform enabling users to send and receive money worldwide with ease. The app offers real-time transaction tracking, multi-currency support, and strong security features, all wrapped in a user-friendly interface.
purpose: Designed to streamline international money transfers for individuals and businesses, providing a reliable, efficient, and accessible digital solution.
features: User registration and authentication with email verification
Real-time transaction tracking and notifications
Multi-currency support with live exchange rates
In-app chat for customer support and dispute resolution
Admin dashboard for managing users and transactions

techStack.name: IOS
techStack.description: Used to build the native mobile application for Apple devices, ensuring a smooth and secure user experience.

techStack.name: Android
techStack.description: Developed the native mobile app for Android devices, providing broad accessibility and performance.

techStack.name: Node.js
techStack.description: Served as the backend runtime environment for building scalable APIs and handling business logic.

techStack.name: Docker
techStack.description: Enabled containerization of services for consistent deployment and simplified development workflows.

techStack.name: AWS
techStack.description: Provided cloud infrastructure for hosting, storage, and deployment, ensuring reliability and scalability.

techStack.name: PostgreSQL
techStack.description: Used as the primary relational database for secure and efficient data management.

techStack.name: Socket.io
techStack.description: Implemented real-time communication features such as transaction updates and in-app chat.

title: My Salon Club
subtitle: Complete salon management app for booking, payments, and customer management.
description: A comprehensive platform designed to streamline salon operations, enabling easy appointment booking, secure payments, and efficient customer management. The app provides salon owners and customers with a seamless and intuitive experience.
purpose: Built to simplify and automate salon management processes, targeting salon owners and customers seeking a modern, digital solution for appointments, payments, and client engagement.
features: Appointment scheduling with real-time availability
Secure payment processing with multiple payment gateways
Customer management system for tracking appointments and preferences
Push notifications for appointment reminders and promotions
Admin dashboard for managing salons, services, and staff

title: We Are Makeup
subtitle: A digital hub for connecting, empowering, and growing the makeup industry.
description: A dynamic platform designed to unite makeup professionals, brands, and enthusiasts. It streamlines collaboration, showcases talent, and provides tools for business growth, education, and networking within the makeup industry.
purpose: Created to empower the makeup community by offering a centralized digital space for networking, learning, and business development, targeting artists, brands, and beauty enthusiasts seeking growth and collaboration opportunities.
features: Networking opportunities for makeup professionals and brands
Educational resources and tutorials for skill development
Showcase platform for artists to display their work
Business tools for managing appointments, clients, and finances
Community forums for discussion and collaboration

title: Krushley Dating App
subtitle: An innovative dating platform that connects users through shared interests and activities.
description: A modern dating app designed to foster genuine connections by matching users based on common interests and preferred activities. The platform encourages meaningful interactions and provides a safe, engaging environment for singles to meet and connect.
purpose: Built to revolutionize online dating by focusing on shared experiences and interests, targeting singles seeking authentic relationships and engaging ways to meet new people.
features: User profiles with interest-based matching algorithms
In-app messaging and video chat for secure communication
Activity suggestions based on shared interests
Push notifications for new matches and messages
Admin dashboard for managing users and content
